price: que les infligía el Faraón. Él era soberbio y transgresor.
arabic: مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: min fir'ʿawna innahu kāna ʿāliyan mina al-mus'rifīna
